mod.name: Hubris
mod.description: Content expansion mod. Adds new cards, relics, events, and monsters.

cards.name: Readied Action
cards.description:
At the end of this turn, Retain up to 1 card.
It costs 1 less Energy next turn.

cards.name: Readied Action+
cards.description:
At the end of this turn, Retain up to 2 cards.
They cost 1 less Energy next turn.

cards.name: Cleaving Finish
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
If this kills an enemy, this card stays in your hand and costs 0 for the turn.

cards.name: Cleaving Finish+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If this kills an enemy, this card stays in your hand and costs 0 for the turn.

cards.name: Sharpening Stone
cards.description:
Choose 2 Attacks in hand, they gain hubris:Piercing for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sharpening Stone+
cards.description:
Choose 2 Attacks in hand, they gain hubris:Piercing for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.
Startup: A random Attack in your deck gains hubris:Piercing for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Stunning Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Stun the enemy for 1 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stunning Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Stun the enemy for 1 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sleight of Hand
cards.description:
Discard 1 card.
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Sleight of Hand+
cards.description:
Discard 1 card.
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Counter
cards.description: If an enemy intends to attack, deal damage equal to its intended damage.

cards.name: Counter+
cards.description: If an enemy intends to attack, deal damage equal to its intended damage.

cards.name: Sniper
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, Shivs deal 2 additional damage.

cards.name: Sniper+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, Shivs deal 3 additional damage.

cards.name: Trick Cloak
cards.description:
Fetch a random card from your discard pile.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Trick Cloak+
cards.description:
Fetch a card from your discard pile.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Power Surge
cards.description:
Grave.
Autoplay.
Lose 2 Focus.
NL Startup: Gain 2 Focus.

cards.name: Power Surge+
cards.description:
Grave.
Autoplay.
Lose 3 Focus.
NL Startup: Gain 3 Focus.

cards.name: Ukulele
cards.description: Deal 10 damage for each Lightning you currently have Channeled.

cards.name: Ukulele+
cards.description: Deal 12 damage for each Lightning you currently have Channeled.

cards.name: Do While
cards.description:
This turn, your next card is repeated at
+1 [E] until you run out of [E].

cards.name: Do While+
cards.description:
This turn, your next card is repeated at
+1 [E] until you run out of [E].

cards.name: Prefetch
cards.description:
Choose a card in your hand. It is Innate for the next combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prefetch+
cards.description:
Choose a card in your hand. It is Innate for the next combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Specialized Circuitry
cards.description:
Choose a type of orb.
Anytime you Channel an orb, Channel the chosen type instead.

cards.name: Specialized Circuitry+
cards.description:
Innate.
Choose a type of orb.
Anytime you Channel an orb, Channel the chosen type instead.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Merchant's Hand
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain 8 Gold.

cards.name: Merchant's Hand+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain 10 Gold.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Mulligan
cards.description:
Retain.
Discard your hand,
then draw that many cards.
Purge.

cards.name: Negative Energy
cards.description:
Retain.
Heal Necromantic Totem 25 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Acid
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Insight
cards.description: Look at the top 3 cards of your draw pile. Add one of them to your hand.

cards.name: Insight+
cards.description: Look at the top 5 cards of your draw pile. Add one of them to your hand.

cards.name: Ssssneak
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Draw additional cards equal to this card's cost.
Snecko.

cards.name: Ssssneak+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Draw additional cards equal to double this card's cost.
Snecko.

cards.name: Enhance Ability
cards.description: Gain either 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, 1 Focus, or 10  Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Enhance Ability+
cards.description: Gain either 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, 2 Focus, or 20  Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Hubris
cards.description:
Innate. Autoplay.
Shuffle a random Curse into your draw pile.
Purge. Soulbound.

cards.name: Natural One
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy.
Soulbound.

cards.name: SPICE
cards.description: Obtain the Spice relic instead of this card.

cards.name: Compulsion
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, chooses a random card in your hand. You must play that card before any other.

cards.name: Despair
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Each time you shuffle your draw pile, this card is placed on top.
Grave.

cards.name: Disease
cards.description:
Unplayable. Retain
At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card into your discard pile.

cards.name: Envy
cards.description:
Autoplay.
A random card in your hand becomes Unplayable for the turn.

cards.name: Gluttony
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in hand, all cards Exhaust.

cards.name: Greed
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Permanently add a copy of this card to your deck. Gain 5 extra gold at the end of combat for each Greed in your deck.

cards.name: Lust
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Choose a random enemy. This turn, any time you attack that enemy, lose 3 HP.

cards.name: Sloth
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Lose all max energy. Gain 1 max energy at the end of each turn.

cards.name: Wrath
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
Place a copy of this card into your discard pile.

relics.name: 10-Foot Pole
relics.description: Take 50% less damage outside of combat.
relics.flavorText: Almost as useful as a towel.

relics.name: Ancient Text
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 1 additional card, then place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Crumbles into dust at the slightest touch.

relics.name: Ball of Yels
relics.description: Whenever you Channel a Lightning, trigger its passive ability.
relics.flavorText: At least they're not in your hovercraft.

relics.name: Champion Shield
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you are immune to debuffs from enemies.
relics.flavorText: The Champ's shield... maybe?

relics.name: Fox Tail
relics.description: Cantrips are always considered Spells.
relics.flavorText: No foxes were harmed in the making of this relic.

relics.name: Old Nail
relics.description: Perhaps it can be reforged...
relics.flavorText: Blunt with age and wear.

relics.name: Slimy Hat
relics.description: Raise your maximum hand size by 2.
relics.flavorText: This would be a really nice hat if it wasn't covered in slime.

relics.name: Toy Battleship
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, during the next combat the first card played each turn also draws 1 card.

relics.name: Bottled Rain
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. This card will always Retain.
relics.flavorText: Petrichor.

relics.name: Crystal Statue
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Breaks after you take 20 unblocked Attack damage.
relics.flavorText: The slightest touch could shatter it.

relics.name: Cunning Disguise
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose another character. On future Card Reward screens you have 1 additional card to choose from that will be from that character.
relics.flavorText: Absolutely no one could possibly recognize you while you're wearing this disguise.

relics.name: Deck of Holding
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate. Usable once per combat.
Retain your hand this turn.
Synergy: Runic Pyramid
relics.flavorText: A nice box to hold your cards.

relics.name: Duct Tape
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 2 cards and combine them.
relics.flavorText: Fix anything.

relics.name: Iron Body
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your Strength.
relics.flavorText: Flex the pain away.

relics.name: Metronome
relics.description: Increases Strength for each sequential Attack played, up to a maximum of 10. Playing a Non-Attack card or losing HP resets the bonus to 0.
relics.flavorText: Stronger and Stronger.

relics.name: Mysterious Pyramids
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose two cards. Whenever you draw one of these cards, draw the other.
relics.flavorText: Usually they come in sets of four.

relics.name: Peanut Butter
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 8 Temporary_HP.
relics.flavorText: Is it pronounced gif or gif?

relics.name: RGB Lights
relics.description: Every time you Evoke 3 Orbs in a single turn, Evoke the third Orb 2 times.
relics.flavorText: More colors makes it run faster.

relics.name: Reverence
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate. Usable once per turn.
Play an Attack card from your hand at no cost and Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: An inscription on the gun reads: "Reverence - Property of Crowbot"

relics.name: Software Update
relics.description: Increase your maximum Orb capacity to 15.
relics.flavorText: Upgrading from 32-bit to 64-bit gives you access to a lot more RAM.

relics.name: Sphere of Dissonance
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, apply 3 Vulnerable to a random enemy.
Synergy: Juzu Bracelet
relics.flavorText: You are your own worst enemy.

relics.name: Tin Flute
relics.description: At the end of this run, choose one card in your deck. You start your next run with that card in your deck.
relics.flavorText: It feels like you've seen this before.

relics.name: 64-Bit Clover
relics.description: Every 7th normal enemy combat drops a Relic.

relics.name: Astral Hammer
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, reduce its cost by 1 for the rest of combat. Playing an Attack that costs 0 Exhausts it.
relics.flavorText: "Forged in the heart of celestial fire. Powered by lasers entwined in a star. Crystal enchantment of steel."

relics.name: Bundle of Herbs
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Lose 1 charge, gain 3 Regen.
Whenever you enter a Rest Site, add 1 charge.
Starts with 2 charges.
relics.flavorText: A collection of healing herbs: sage, thyme, greenwarish, rosemary.

relics.name: Curious Feather
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: You can't help but feel curious about the world while holding this feather.

relics.name: Fun Fungus
relics.description: If you have leftover energy at the end of your turn, heal that much HP at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: If you remain still, this fungus will grow into your wounds and heal them.

relics.name: Glazed Torus
relics.description: Gain 1 Strength at the end of each of your odd numbered turns.
relics.flavorText: Not actually edible.

relics.name: Medical Manual
relics.description:
Exhaust the first Status drawn each turn.
Synergy: Medical Kit
relics.flavorText: "It's Spireblight."

relics.name: Potato
relics.description: During your turn, you are immune to damage.
relics.flavorText: A staple of pre-Spireblight life.

relics.name: Short Range Teleporter
relics.description:
You may skip rooms, instead entering a room two floors away.
Has 2 charges. Kill Bosses or Elites to regain charges.
relics.flavorText: A prototype teleporter from before the Spireblight. No one knows how it works anymore.

relics.name: Spice
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 8.
Draw 1 additional card each turn.
Warning: Highly addictive!
relics.flavorText: Must flow.

relics.name: Zylophone
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a 0 or 1 cost card. This card now costs X, applying its effect X times when played.
relics.flavorText: C C G G A A G F F E E D D C

relics.name: Bottled Heart
relics.description:
Upon pickup, this relic gains charge equal to half your Max HP and your Max HP is reduced to 1.
Start each combat with Temporary_HP equal to this relic's charge.
Any changes to Max HP affect this instead.
Synergy: Necronomicon
relics.flavorText: Your own heart in a bottle. Still beating.

relics.name: Dead Torch
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, gain 1 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: Emits a soft, blue light that attracts the souls of the dead.

relics.name: Evacipated Box
relics.description: Future Boss chests have 1 additional relic to choose from.
relics.flavorText: evacipate: v. To undo the consequences of your actions by changing the original circumstances. To erase your own history.

relics.name: Fruit Bowl
relics.description: Changes to Max HP are increased by 50%.
relics.flavorText: Store your fruit in an aesthetically pleasing manner.

relics.name: Macrotransations
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Lose 100 Gold.
Immediately kill all non-Elite, non-Boss enemies.
relics.flavorText: All payments wired directly to Merchant.

relics.name: Nice Rug
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Plated Armor for every 50 Gold you have.
relics.flavorText: You killed a nice, blue merchant for this. That wasn't very nice of you.

relics.name: Runic Icosahedron
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Once per combat, you may roll the Icosahedron.
relics.flavorText: Twisting fate, 1d20 at a time.

relics.name: Towel
relics.description: Future relic rewards from combats and non-Boss chests give you a choice between two relics.
relics.flavorText: Now you're a real frood.

relics.name: test447
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
relics.flavorText: TODO

relics.name: Backtick
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose any non-boss non-event relic to obtain.
relics.flavorText: ` relic add test447

relics.name: Black Hole
relics.description:
All cards cost 0.
Any card entering your discard pile is exhausted.
relics.flavorText: While consuming everything you put into it, it radiates a strange energy.

relics.name: Cracked Hourglass
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. If any battle takes longer than 3 minutes, you die.
relics.flavorText: Your time is running out...

relics.name: Grand Snecko Eye
relics.description: Gain [E] and Transform 2 cards at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Perplexingly large.

relics.name: Hollow Soul
relics.description:
When you would die in combat, immediately restart the fight with 20% Max HP.
Regain your original Max HP, heal to 50% of your Max HP, and recharge this relic if you win the fight.
relics.flavorText: An echo of a past life. Perhaps with this you may become whole.

relics.name: Runic Obelisk
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Lower your maximum hand size by 3.
relics.flavorText: Extremely heavy, but the runes gives you power.

relics.name: Scarier Mask
relics.description: The weakest enemy flees at the beginning of multi-enemy fights.
relics.flavorText: Scary.

relics.name: Stopwatch
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate. Usable once per combat.
Lose 1 charge. At the end of your turn, immediately start another turn. Energy and Block are maintained between these turns.
Starts with 6 charges.
relics.flavorText: Maybe time's just a construct of human perception, an illusion created by—

relics.name: Terracotta Horce
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Raise your Ascension level by 5.
relics.flavorText: "A facsinating example of pre-Spireblight civilization." - Ranwid

relics.name: Virtuous Blindfold
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. You can no longer see the entire map.
relics.flavorText: Emotions are prohibited.

relics.name: Empty Bottle
relics.description: Potions may be used twice.
relics.flavorText: Just pour half the potion into this bottle and suddenly you have two potions!

relics.name: Herbal Paste
relics.description:
Start each combat with 3 Regen.
Regen can go to -1.
relics.flavorText: A foul smelling substance. Perhaps slathering it on your skin will heal your wounds.

relics.name: Madman's Spell Book
relics.description:
Reverse Spells and Artes.
All Spells are now Artes, all Artes are now Spells.
relics.flavorText: The scrawlings of a madman who spent too much time in the Spire.
